admissions.title: Admissions
admissions.subtitle: Join Our School Community
admissions.step1Desc: Complete the online application form with all required documents.
admissions.step2Desc: Students take an age-appropriate assessment to determine placement.
admissions.step3Desc: Meet with our admissions team for a brief family interview.
admissions.step4Desc: Receive your acceptance letter and complete enrollment.
